#summary jiffle: a JAI ImageFunction scripting language

= Introduction =

The jiffle language is intended to make it easier to create images from mathematical expressions whose inputs are image location and/or other image values.

= Description of the language =

Jiffle's syntax is similar to (ie. heavily borrowed from) C and Java.

* Arithmetic operators
  || `^` ||Raise to power     ||
  || `*` ||Multiply           ||
  || `/` ||Divide             ||
  || `%` ||Modulo (remainder) ||
  || `+` ||Add                ||
  || `-` ||Subtract           ||

All the ones you'd expect...
